description: When specifying a default kernel and ramdisk with euca-bundle-image's --kernel and --ramdisk options, they are not stored in the image's metadata.
title: Default kernel and ramdisk from image manifest are ignored

comments.content: When specifying a default kernel and ramdisk with euca-bundle-image's --kernel and --ramdisk options, they are not stored in the image's metadata.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~soren
